name: brianhenryie/php-diff-test
description: Run only the tests that apply to changed lines.

analyze-changes: updated_files=$(echo $(git diff --name-only `git merge-base origin/main HEAD` | grep php | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 ls -1df 2>/dev/null)); if [ -n "$updated_files" ]; then phpstan analyse --memory-limit=-1 $updated_files --verbose || true; else echo "No modified php files for phpstan."; fi;
analyze-changes-strict: updated_files=$(echo $(git diff --name-only `git merge-base origin/main HEAD` | grep php | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 ls -1df 2>/dev/null)); if [ -n "$updated_files" ]; then phpstan analyse --memory-limit=-1 $updated_files --level 10 --verbose || true; else echo "No modified php files for phpstan."; fi;
cs-changes: updated_files=$(echo $(git diff --name-only `git merge-base origin/master HEAD` | grep \.php | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 ls -1df 2>/dev/null)); if [ -n "$updated_files" ]; then phpcbf $(echo $updated_files); phpcs $(echo $updated_files); phpstan analyse $(echo $updated_files) --memory-limit 1G; else echo "No modified php files for phpstan."; fi;
cs-changes-strict: updated_files=$(echo $(git diff --name-only `git merge-base origin/master HEAD` | grep \.php | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 ls -1df 2>/dev/null)); if [ -n "$updated_files" ]; then phpcbf $(echo $updated_files); phpcs $(echo $updated_files); phpstan analyse $(echo $updated_files) --level max --memory-limit 1G; else echo "No modified php files for phpstan."; fi;
test-coverage: if [ "$XDEBUG_MODE" != "coverage" ]; then echo "Run with 'XDEBUG_MODE=coverage composer test-coverage'"; exit 1; fi;
if [ $(command -v ./tools/phpcov) ]; then git diff main...head > /tmp/main.diff; ./tools/phpcov patch-coverage --path-prefix $(pwd) ./tests/_reports/php.cov /tmp/main.diff || true; fi;

scripts-descriptions.test-coverage: Run PHPUnit tests with coverage. Use 'XDEBUG_MODE=coverage composer test-coverage' to run, 'open ./tests/_reports/html/index.html' to view.
